some tips for doing a juice cleanse you
will need a proper juicer to extract the
juice from the fruits and vegetables
it's not the same
blending in a blender I used the philips
vive quick clean for almost every juice
that i made and only the morning and
evening almond milk drink when in the
blender it's handy to drink from a
drinking water bottle that has
measurements on it so you can keep track
of how much you're drinking throughout
the day
don't go to the supermarket wild on a
cleanse get everything you need
beforehand so that you won't be tempted
by everything on the shelves do the
cleanse when you have some free time
don't do it when you've got lots of
events or parties to go to stay busy
during the day to avoid boredom and this
will help stop your mind from wandering
and thinking about food go to bed early
get lots of sleep I was in bed by 10
p.m. every night of the juice cleanse so
